coach.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: someone who trains a person or team in a sport
coach.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: someone who gives private lessons to someone in a particular subject, especially so that they can pass an examination
coach.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a bus with comfortable seats used for long journeys
coach.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: The restaurant was full of coach parties (=groups of people travelling together on a coach).
We went to Paris by coach.
She’s going to Grimsby on a coach.
coach.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: one of the parts of the train in which the passengers sit
coach.translation[0].definitions[4].defi: a large carriage pulled by horses and used in the past for carrying passengers
coach.translation[0].definitions[5].defi: the cheapest type of seats on a plane or train
coach.translation[0].definitions[5].exam: We flew coach out to Atlanta.
coach.translation[0].note_box[0].heading: – Meaning 1: someone who trains a person or team in a sport
coach.translation[0].note_box[0].section: Jody became the women’s basketball coach.
Jim is head coach of the Dallas Mavericks.
He took a job as an assistant coach at the college.
Davies was the national coach up to the 1995 World Cup.
He’s one of America’s top coaches.
The tennis club has a professional coach.
coach.translation[0].note_box[1].heading: – Meaning 3: a bus with comfortable seats used for long journeys
coach.translation[0].note_box[1].section: Express coach services run throughout the day.
The company had thirty-five new passenger coaches.
A huge number of tourist coaches visit the site.
We spent three days travelling by coach across France.
A group of tourists were getting on the coach.
When everyone was there, we boarded the coach for the journey home.
The two-night coach trip to Paris will cost £149.
How about going on a coach tour around Europe this year?
There are coach excursions to the great classical site at Ephesus.
We’re organizing a coach party to the theatre.
He worked as a part-time coach driver.
You will go from Victoria Coach Station to Amsterdam.
Our express coach service goes to the South of France and Costa Brava.
The advantage of coach travel is that it’s relatively cheap.
coach.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to teach a person or team the skills they need for a sport
coach.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Nigel coaches a cricket team in his spare time.
coach.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to give someone private lessons in a particular subject, especially so that they can pass an important test
coach.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: The child was coached for stardom by her mother.
coach.translation[1].definitions[2].defi: to help someone prepare what they should say or do in a particular situation – used to show disapproval
coach.translation[1].definitions[2].exam: The girl must have been carefully coached in what to say in court.
